name: Runeous: Part One
description: Join our heroes in a world ravished by the wars of it's past in this exciting Visual Novel experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This short visual novel wasnt really for me. But it's free, Worth it if you're trying out a different genre other than otome. Go for the achievements.
